title: The truth about Slanderman.
subtitle: In 2014, two 12-year-old girls were arrested for stabbing a schoolmate in Wakesha, and Wisconsin told the police that she did it to placate.
author: David Emery
vclaim: There's a faceless semihuman named Slanderman, who stands eight feet tall, has arms sensors, chases and eats young children, and telepathically communicates with his human service, called "proxies."
